trans-unit.source: Represents the geometry of a line.
trans-unit.target: 表示線條的幾何。

trans-unit.source: To create multiple connected lines, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> or <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline> segment with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立多個連接的直線，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>或<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Polyline>區段與<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>類別。

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可凍結的功能：**因為它繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>類別提供數個特殊功能：<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> class that has no length.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個新執行個體沒有長度。

trans-unit.source: The start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 線條的起點。

trans-unit.source: The end point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行的結束點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> class that has the specified start and end points.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的起始點和結束點。

trans-unit.source: The start point.
trans-unit.target: 起始點。

trans-unit.source: The end point.
trans-unit.target: 結束點。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the line.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至線條的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 與軸對齊的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 與軸對齊的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會計入帳戶的區域可能由加入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定行的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The end point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 行的結束點。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 (0,0)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.EndPoint" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.EndPoint" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: 容許的計算誤差。

trans-unit.source: The specified type for interpreting the error tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯容許誤差的指定型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件的填滿區域。

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object, which is always 0 because a line contains no area.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件的填滿區域，因為線條不含區域，所以一律為 0。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件是否空白。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 為空白，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object can have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件是否具有弧形片段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> object can have curved segments; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry" /> 物件可以具有弧形片段則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定線條的起點。

trans-unit.source: The start point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 線條的起點。

trans-unit.source: The default is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 (0,0)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.StartPoint" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry.StartPoint" /> 相依性屬性。
